message: I propose we divide the money with an 80/20 split, where I receive $8000 and you receive $2000.
I'll give you a 50/50 split, but I think we can do better than that!
Considering the inflation, I propose we divide the money with a 72/28 split, where I receive $7200 and you receive $2800.
I'll give you a 60/40 split, but I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal!
